main event: A round, reddish yellow object was sighted moving straight across the sky from north to south for about 30 seconds at Camp Hill, Alabama on 14 October 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as very small, possibly compared to an artificial moon., The object's speed was estimated to be between 1,400 to 1,800 M.P.H., The sighting was made from ground level with visual binocular assistance., The observers included adult instructors and students from Camp Hill Military Academy., The object disappeared behind a building after the sighting.
witness description: adult instructors and students at Camp Hill Military Academy
